Class RuleBuilderBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • tsi.utils.transform.RuleBuilderBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FluentMapper

    public class RuleBuilderBase
extends Object
    Provides utiliy dsl methods to easily create selectors, callbacks etc for mapping

    pemucha

      • expr

        protected Selector expr(String script)
        returns a script-selector. Instead of a value, the return value of the script will be used as selected value.
        Parameters:
        script - script expression
        Returns:
        the expression selector
